title: AMTD
name: amtd
description: Automated Movie Trailer Downloader is a Radarr companion script to automatically download movie trailers and extras for use in other video applications (plex/kodi/jellyfin/emby)

env.name: AUTOSTART
env.label: AUTOSTART
env.description: Runs script automatically on startup

env.name: SCRIPTINTERVAL
env.label: SCRIPTINTERVAL
env.description: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

env.name: RadarrUrl
env.label: RadarrUrl
env.description: Set domain or IP to your Radarr instance including port.

env.name: extrastype
env.label: extrastype
env.description: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurette, etc...), trailers only downloads trailers

env.name: LANGUAGES
env.label: LANGUAGES
env.description: Set the primary desired language, if not found, fallback to next language in the list... (this is a "," separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes)

env.name: USEFOLDERS
env.label: USEFOLDERS
env.description: Creates subfolders within the movie folder for extras

env.name: SINGLETRAILER
env.label: SINGLETRAILER
env.description: Only downloads the first available trailer, does not apply to other extras type

env.name: subtitlelanguage
env.label: subtitlelanguage
env.description: Desired Language Code

env.name: PREFER_EXISTING
env.label: PREFER_EXISTING
env.description: Checks for existing "trailer" file, and skips it if found

env.name: EndClient
env.label: EndClient
env.description: Select the appropriate client for maximum compatibility

title: Bazarr
name: bazarr
description: Bazarr is a companion application to Sonarr and Radarr. It manages and downloads subtitles based on your requirements. You define your preferences by TV show or movie and Bazarr takes care of everything for you.

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: Duck DNS
name: duckdns
description: â€‹Duckdns is a free service which will point a DNS (sub domains of duckdns.org) to an IP of your choice. The service is completely free, and doesn't require reactivation or forum posts to maintain its existence.

env.name: SUBDOMAINS
env.label: SUBDOMAINS
env.description: multiple subdomains allowed, comma separated, no spaces

env.name: TOKEN
env.label: TOKEN
env.description: DuckDNS token

title: Filebrowser
name: filebrowser
description: filebrowser provides a file managing interface within a specified directory and it can be used to upload, delete, preview, rename and edit your files.
note: The default user and password is admin/admin. To ensure the DB containing your login persists through a rebuild, create a filebrowser.db file in the !config/filebrowser container folder. Official web.

title: Plex
name: plex
description: Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices.

env.name: PLEX_CLAIM
env.label: PLEX_CLAIM
env.description: https://www.plex.tv/claim

env.name: ADVERTISE_IP
env.label: ADVERTISE_IP
env.description: Aid your local clients in discovering your plex server

env.name: ALLOWED_NETWORKS
env.label: ALLOWED_NETWORKS
env.description: Regain access without providing credentials

title: Prowlarr
name: prowlarr
description: Prowlarr is a indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps. Prowlarr supports both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers. It integrates seamlessly with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required (we do it all).

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: pyLoad-ng
name: pyload-ng
description: Free and Open Source download manager written in Python and designed to be extremely lightweight, easily extensible and fully manageable via web.

title: qBittorrent
name: qbittorrent
description: The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to ÂµTorrent.
note: You can use the alternative Web UI VueTorrent in /app/vuetorrent. Official web.

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: Radarr
name: radarr
description: Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available.

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: Readarr
name: readarr
description: Readarr is an ebook (and maybe eventually magazine/audiobook) collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new books from your favorite authors and will grab, sort and rename them.

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: Sonarr
name: sonarr
description: Sonarr is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.

env.name: TP_HOTIO
env.label: TP_HOTIO
env.description: Tell theme.park that we are using hotio paths.

env.name: TP_THEME
env.label: TP_THEME
env.description: theme.park theme

title: SWAG
name: swag
description: SWAG - Secure Web Application Gateway (formerly known as letsencrypt, no relation to Let's Encryptâ„¢) sets up an Nginx webserver and reverse proxy with php support and a built-in certbot client that automates free SSL server certificate generation and renewal processes (Let's Encrypt and ZeroSSL). It also contains fail2ban for intrusion prevention.

env.name: SUBDOMAINS
env.label: SUBDOMAINS
env.description: Subdomains you'd like the cert to cover

env.name: VALIDATION
env.label: VALIDATION
env.description: Certbot validation method to use, options are http, dns or duckdns

env.name: URL
env.label: URL
env.description: Top url you have control over

env.name: EMAIL
env.label: EMAIL
env.description: Optional e-mail address used for cert expiration notifications

title: Unpackerr
name: unpackerr
description: This application runs as a daemon on your download host. It checks for completed downloads and extracts them so Radarr, Lidarr, Sonarr, and Readarr may import them.
note: You can configure it (with *arr APIs, etc) in the unpackerr.conf file in the !config/unpackerrr container folder. Official web.

title: Watchtower
name: watchtower
description: A process for automating Docker container base image updates.

env.name: WATCHTOWER_CLEANUP
env.label: WATCHTOWER_CLEANUP
env.description: Removes old images after updating.

env.name: WATCHTOWER_DEBUG
env.label: WATCHTOWER_DEBUG
env.description: Enable debug mode with verbose logging.

env.name: WATCHTOWER_INCLUDE_STOPPED
env.label: WATCHTOWER_INCLUDE_STOPPED
env.description: Will also include created and exited containers.

env.name: WATCHTOWER_POLL_INTERVAL
env.label: WATCHTOWER_POLL_INTERVAL
env.description: Poll interval (in seconds = 1 hour).

env.name: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATIONS
env.label: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATIONS
env.description: Send notifications via containrrr/shoutrrr.

env.name: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_URL
env.label: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_URL
env.description: The shoutrrr service URL to be used.

title: WireGuard
name: wireguard
description: WireGuardÂ® is an extremely simple yet fast and modern VPN that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptography. It aims to be faster, simpler, leaner, and more useful than IPsec, while avoiding the massive headache. It intends to be considerably more performant than OpenVPN. WireGuard is designed as a general purpose VPN for running on embedded interfaces and super computers alike, fit for many different circumstances.
note: The peer/client config qr codes will be output in the docker log. They will also be saved in text and png format under /config/peerX in case PEERS is a variable and an integer or /config/peer_X in case a list of names was provided instead of an integer. Make sure to make port 51820 public if accessing remotely. Official web.

env.name: SERVERURL
env.label: SERVERURL
env.description: External IP or domain name for docker host.

env.name: SERVERPORT
env.label: SERVERPORT
env.description: External port for docker host.

env.name: PEERS
env.label: PEERS
env.description: Number or list of names of peers to create confs for.

env.name: INTERNAL_SUBNET
env.description: Internal subnet for the wireguard and server and peers (only change if it clashes).
env.label: INTERNAL_SUBNET
